  2. M.S. by Research Programs

    • M.S. by Research in Computational Economics (offered by CMCE; Coordinator - Dr. Abhinaba Lahiri)

    • M.Tech. (Executive) in AR VR (Coordinators - Dr. Amit Bhardwaj, Dr. Rajendra Nagar)
    • M.Tech. (Executive) in Data and Computational Science (Coordinator - Dr. Gaurav Bhatnagar)
  4. Minor Programs for B.Tech.
